TopicTitle: Switch between vessels without going eva

Articles.Content:
Hello,

Ive 2 questions, first I made a space station with several modules, but how can I switch with a kerbonaut between the modules without going EVA?

Also can I walk around in the spacestation with IVA?

Greets

Edited June 27, 2013 by onlinegamesz
The bracket keys [] to switch ships in render range (2.5 km of it)

The bracket keys [] to switch ships in render range (2.5 km of it)

Read the OP post or don't bother answering!

For the OP:

Sadly it is not possible to transfer crew between module. You will have to EVA to transfer your crew.

Well if the OP does not mind installing a mod the Crew Manifest mod allows you to do this.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/24636-0-20-X-Kerbal-Crew-Manifest-v0-5-4-0-Released%21-Create-Edit-Remove-Kerbals

Also sadly you can only IVA a kerbal in a command module/cockpit.

Thanks for the link!

Just remember to put the mod it in the right folder and you should be good. Be weary that mods don't work and could really screw with your game when ran outdated, so be sure to delete it when a new patch comes out. And a general rule is to make a back-up with your save just in case something goes wrong.

Edited June 27, 2013 by WhiteWeasel
